game.name: Knights End
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Work together to survive the knight shift in this co-op PvE horror game. Serve your villagers’ as a disgraced knight by completing their commands in a cursed kingdom. Reclaim your lost honor to earn items and a chance at your freedom.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Work together to survive the knight shift in this co-op PvE horror game. Serve your villagers’ as a disgraced knight by completing their commands in a cursed kingdom. Reclaim your lost honor to earn items and a chance at your freedom.
